title: ChefBot
description: AI-powered recipe app built with React, Tailwind, and Firebase that generates meals from ingredients you have on hand.

title: SyncUp
description: A mentorship and collaboration platform connecting i.c.stars interns and alumni through projects and feedback.

title: D.A.S.H. (United Airlines)

title: Security Buddy
